column3: “Dank! Best bud I've smoked to date it's gas”

“I've been smoking it for about a week, maybe two. I seriously hurt my back a couple days ago and van barely walk. Jazz has been such a life saver. It's pain control level is amazing. For the last couple days, I've been on average about 6/10-12/10 on the pain scale and its helped me cut the edge down so I can relax. I have oxycodon, but can only take it every 6 hours and it makes me nauseas anyways. So happy I have Ja...”
“tastie and uplifting.”

“I thought it was a bright, clean, cerebral effect with no notable couch lock attribute I could detect anyway. 
A must for the daytime working hours.”
“Clear high...not buzzy which left me wanting more  citrus pepper taste  lingers with a dry mouth feel”

“This is my pain strain. It makes me feel like I'm curled up in a blanket of cats who are purring....while drinking the perfect temperature of hot coco. I have disk problems and nerve pain and this relaxes my entire body which eliminates the pain.”

“Definitely sinks me into the couch, which is what I was looking for, high lasts a long time. Put 4 stars because I was looking for a strain that didn't make me hungry, or think I'm hungry, and this strain didn't have that as a side effect. I'm pretty sure I ate all my new groceries last night.”

“Vaped coarsely-ground in my MFLB.  Mild aroma, pleasant fruity-tart flavor like peach skin.  Good, strong high.  Some visual distortion--flattened depth perception and color enhancement.  Intense body high, very tingly and uplifted.  Felt like being tickled from the inside.  Initial high seems to fade after about forty-five minutes, but then returns in waves for another hour.  Would definitely buy again.”
“Good smooth smoke. The citrus smell is phenomenal. Clear high that leaves one able to accomplish any daily tasks easily. Daytime smoke.”
“My new fave. It's a high sativa, very energetic and happy weed. I really enjoy it. I don't recommend smoking this at night.”
“Ok maybe a no good batch”

“Really enjoyable & compliments CBD strains perfectly.  It's great for still being functional but relaxed. The happy relaxation lasts long after the buzz wears off. Good for people who don't want to be too stoned when they're stoned or used more medicinally.”
“This rare bud is a must-buy if you see it - a perfect body high with stimulating happiness/calmness effects that turn it into a sort of 'seasoned users' functional high.”

“Ya was there today Kris was my budtender being my first time he was very helpful made my experience very comfortable and was also very knowledgeable about everything and he was very friendly and I will most diffenitly returning”
“Great daytime smoke, clear headed & full of energy. Dawg Star Grew my batch full of flavor the pepper undertone is awesome yes it does leave the mouth dry & the head wanting more.”
“The jazz I know is jack herrar X Razzel”
“super stoney... thanks to the people at silvertem.”

“Nice smooth flavored. Hints of flower in the taste. No coughing for me. Vaped it, not much of a smell. Definitely feels nice. Felt my creative juices flowing. Gave it 3 stars because the effect doesn't last that long. I do like it though.”
“if you get the opportunity definitely try this one it's a rare and enjoyable treat”
“As the name suggest - strain has a nice high that goes along ways. Best used when up and about. Added bonus - its tasty and aromatic - just shy of Plushberry.”

“If your looking for a head high, move on.  But this will get you feeling good, focused and productive.  I need to be punched in the face a little harder myself.  2 hits off a $9 joint and I'm feeling great!”
“27% at silverstem”
“it was alright made me awake for a couple of hours if you like that kind of stuf then this strian is for you.”
“Wasn't jazzed" about this one. Looked great but was bland/average and a little on the sleepy side.”"
